title: Mother's Lover 2
overview: Yoon-jeong goes home to her mother to introduce her to her boyfriend who she promised to marry. Her mother likes Seong-tae and that he's a pharamacist. Sook-jin prepares a feast for her daughter and future son-in-law. They have a good time until Sook-jin's boyfriend Jong-pil joins them. Yoon-jung is shocked to see Jong-pil...
